text: @Mike_Pence @SecretaryCarson @JohnCornyn @robertjeffress Catch the virus, get put on a ventilator and then maybe you will admit Trump pulled the wool over your eyes and corrupted you more. Helping him to spread COVID19 by going to thar church is attempting murder. #CoronavirusPandemic https://t.co/65OJTDIlMZ
